name: A Cat's Manor
description: Cat’s Manor is a puzzle based adventure about personal discovery. Waking up without any memory, and seeing a hand attached to the end of his tail, our unlikely victim must piece together what has happened, and what looming dangers are closing in. You soon realize you’re locked up in a house with an eccentric family whose demeanor doesn’t bode well. Help our little protagonist make sense of the world and its occupants. Help the cat escape the Cat’s manor. Featuring unique visuals, movie quality soundtrack, professional voice acting that breathes life into a truly immersive experience.
